Docs.summary: Provides a implementation targeting SQL as the backend store using Entity Framework. In this model, there is a 1:1 mapping between the data object (DTO) exposed through a and the domain model. The is the recommended for situations where there is not a 1:1 relationship between the Data Object (DTO) and the domain model managed by SQL.

Docs.param: The thrown by the update or replace operation.
Docs.summary: Gets the original value of an entity in case an update or replace operation resulted in an . The original value extracted from the exception will get returned to the client so that it can merge the data and possibly try the operation again.
Docs.returns: The original value or null if none are available.
